settings.text: Just because they claim “juice” or “pressed” or “health” doesn’t mean they are.
In fact, as Marcus saw first hand, it likely means they’re not.

settings.heading: We were meant to eat plants.
settings.left_text: This isn’t some whackadoo POV that our founder, Marcus Antebi, picked up after years of jumping out of planes and pressing fresh juice – it’s what the unvarnished science consistently shows.
settings.right_text:
He just listened…and learned…and tinkered…and toiled…until finally he created an approach to juicing that didn’t require pasteurization or additives or preservatives: just the pure way nature intended.


You can taste it in everything we make and how good everything makes you feel.

settings.list_text_left:
• Unpasteurized, unadulterated, unambiguous

  • All about easy, delicious vitality

  • Serious about quality (and little else)
settings.list_text_right:
• You’d be better off drinking from a toilet

  • All about pumping profits

  • Serious about stakeholders (and little else)

settings.text_title: We’re not saying we’re perfect, just gooder than the competition…and challenging you to challenge us to stay that way.
Whether to drop stress or gain years, feel better or do gooder, the solution is the same: plants.

settings.text_title: Drink a lot of our juices? Swear by our superfood smoothies? Hooked on our snacks? Become a card-carrying goodsugar Discount Program loyalist.

settings.title: A diet that’s full of plant-based, nutrient-dense ingredients – and free of animal-based ones – is proven to boost health, support exercise, and (in many cases) reverse the negative side-effects of aging and disease.
settings.subtitle: That’s a fact, and so are these:
settings.bottom_text: hard as it is to live by this ethos, we’ve done our darndest to make it easy, delicious, and fun.

settings.text: The biggest disease were fighting against is an ecological one: single-use plastic (s.u.p).

settings.text_left: From convenience to blight, the death-cycle of s.u.p starts with your choices and ends back in your body: killing a few birds, biomes, and sea dwellers along the way.
settings.text_right:
You’ve heard this before, right?...but have you heard of a new business going as far as to banish all s.u.p from its stores?

We hadn’t either,
so we’re doing it ourselves.
